title: Black screen after champion select
body:
I've had this issue for a while now, every time I go into loading screen (after champion select), i get a black screen for the entier game. I can here what's going on and all, but i can,t click anything or move. I've tried to uninstal-re-instal, i've used the hextech repair tool and all the simple stuff. Can someone tell me if i have to delet some files or do something special.

Thank you for your time.

replies.body: The black screen can happen if a connection issue is struggling to download game assets.  Reinstalling in this case wouldn't do a whole lot because it focuses on game files, and not your connection.  Instead, I suggest going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot whatever is blocking you from accessing the game server.  I hope that helps!
Tried a bunch of those things, none of them worked...

That sucks to hear.  :(  I recommend going over every step though to make sure everything is covered.  Otherwise, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will take a closer look with you directly to see what's up!
